data.title: In Russia by MORATH, Inge and Arthur Miller: Near Fine Hardcover (1969) Signed by Author(s)
data.meta_description: Signed by Author(s) - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Studio / The Viking Press, New York - 1969 - Condition: Near Fine - Near Fine - First edition. Small quarto. Slight soiling on the boards and a little foxing on the front fly, near fine in near fine "custom" handmade dustwrapper made by the cartoonist and satirist Robert Osborn with some modest toning and rubbing. Inscribed by both Arthur Miller and his photographer wife Inge Morath to Osborn and his wife: "To Bob and Elodie, From both of their friends Arthur and Inge. October 1969." Except for Morath's name and the date, the inscription all apears to be in Miller's hand. A pleasant association. - In Russia
data.text:
From Between the Covers-Rare Books, Inc. ABAA, Gloucester City, NJ, U.S.A.

(5-star seller) Seller rating 5 out of 5 stars

AbeBooks Seller since July 25, 1997

View this seller's items

About this Item

First edition. Small quarto. Slight soiling on the boards and a little foxing on the front fly, near fine in near fine "custom" handmade dustwrapper made by the cartoonist and satirist Robert Osborn with some modest toning and rubbing. Inscribed by both Arthur Miller and his photographer wife Inge Morath to Osborn and his wife: "To Bob and Elodie, From both of their friends Arthur and Inge. October 1969." Except for Morath's name and the date, the inscription all apears to be in Miller's hand. A pleasant association. Seller Inventory # 446079

Contact seller

Report this item

Between the Covers is located in a converted 1915 brick school building. You can find us at bookfairs, or subscribe to our catalog mailing list. Samples available upon request. We also provide an elist, please subscribe on our website www.betweenthecovers.com.

Visit Seller's Storefront

Association Member Members of these associations are committed to maintaining the highest standards. They vouch for the authenticity of all items offered for sale. They provide expert and detailed descriptions, disclose all significant defects and/or restorations, provide clear and accurate pricing, and operate with fairness and honesty during the purchase experience.

Seller's business information

Between the Covers-Rare Books, Inc. ABAA

112 Nicholson Road, Gloucester City, NJ, 08030, U.S.A.

Terms of Sale:

All books are first editions unless otherwise noted. New Jersey residents will be asked for sales tax. All items guaranteed, all items subject to prior sale. Members ABAA, ILAB.

112 Nicholson Road, Gloucester City, New Jersey 08030

books@betweenthecovers.com

Telephone 856-456-8008

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Our $10 rate is for UPS or Priority Mail. Our $5.50 rate is media mail which can take a week or two, or a month or two (rarely, but has happened). We email tracking information for all domestic shipments. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.
